name: Bark and Found
description:
Made at Global Game Jam 2021 Description

You are a dog and are lost. While looking for your owner you may come across people in need of your help. Help them and they may provide you clues that may lead to your owner. 

Controls PrimarySecondaryMove
WASDArrow KeysInteract
EPause
Esc Credits
